mapper.select: select s.id,t.name,t.studentCode,t.sex,t.schoolName,t.campusName,t.gradeName,t.id,t.payCondition,c.id,c.gradeName,c.subjectName,c.startTime,c.endTime,c.period,c.rates,s.payState,c.theClass from stuCourse s left outer join student t on s.studentId=t.id left outer join course c on s.courseId=c.id

select s.id,s.payState,t.name,t.studentCode,t.sex,t.schoolName,t.campusName,t.gradeName,t.id studentId,t.payCondition,t.prices,c.id courseId,t.applyNum,c.gradeName,c.subjectName,c.startTime,c.endTime,c.period,c.rates,c.times,c.theClass from stuCourse s left outer join student t on s.studentId=t.id left outer join course c on s.courseId=c.id where s.studentId=#{id} and s.state!=0

select s.id,s.payState,t.name,t.studentCode,t.sex,t.schoolName,t.campusName,t.gradeName,t.id studentId,t.payCondition,t.prices,c.id courseId,t.applyNum,c.gradeName,c.subjectName,c.startTime,c.endTime,c.period,c.rates,c.times,c.theClass from stuCourse s left outer join student t on s.studentId=t.id left outer join course c on s.courseId=c.id where s.studentId=#{id} and s.state!=0

select s.id,s.payState,t.name,t.studentCode,t.sex,t.schoolName,t.campusName,t.gradeName,t.id,c.id,t.payCondition,c.gradeName,c.subjectName,c.startTime,c.endTime,c.period,c.rates,c.theClass from stuCourse s left outer join student t on s.studentId=t.id left outer join course c on s.courseId=c.id where s.id=#{id} and s.state!=0

select s.id,s.payState,t.name,t.studentCode,t.sex,t.schoolName,t.campusName,t.gradeName,t.id studentId,c.id courseId,t.payCondition,c.gradeName,c.subjectName,c.startTime,c.endTime,c.period,c.rates,t.phoneNumOne,t.createDate,c.theClass from stuCourse s left outer join student t on s.studentId=t.id left outer join course c on s.courseId=c.id where s.courseId=#{id} and s.state!=0 order by s.createTime desc

select s.id,s.payState,t.name,t.studentCode,t.sex,t.schoolName,t.campusName,t.gradeName,t.id studentId,t.createDate,t.phoneNumOne,t.applyNum,c.id courseId,t.payCondition,c.gradeName,c.subjectName,c.startTime,c.endTime,c.period,c.rates,c.theClass from stuCourse s left outer join student t on s.studentId=t.id left outer join course c on s.courseId=c.id where c.subjectName=#{subjectName} and s.state!=0

select r.id,t.name,t.studentCode,t.sex,t.schoolName,t.campusName,t.gradeName,t.id studentId,t.createDate,t.phoneNumOne,t.applyNum,c.id courseId,t.payCondition,c.gradeName,c.subjectName,c.startTime,c.endTime,c.period,c.rates,c.theClass from Register r left outer join student t on r.studentId=t.id left outer join course c on r.courseId=c.id where c.id=#{courseId} and r.theTimes=#{times}
mapper.update: update StuCourse set studentId = #{studentId},courseId=#{courseId},payState=#{payState},state=#{state} where id=#{id}
update StuCourse set state = 0 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from stuCourse where courseId=#{courseId} and studentId=#{studentId} and state!=0
select studentId from stuCourse group by studentId having count(*) >4
select studentId from stuCourse group by studentId having count(*) >3;
select studentId from stuCourse group by studentId having count(*) >2;
